## FlyoutButton.moveTo() method

Move the button to the given x, y coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The new x coordinate. |
|  y | number | The new y coordinate. |
